title: Chintz Fragment, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Outline of pattern drawn on. Mordants for 2 reds and 2 purples applied by pen or brush (sometimes over resist). Madder dyed. Blue applied by immersion over resist (chintz).
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 64 x 24 cm (25 3/16 x 9 7/16 in.)
description: Fragment showing exotic flowers on blue stems.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chintz Fragment, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Outline of pattern drawn on. Mordants for 2 reds and 2 purples applied by pen or brush (sometimes over resist). Madder dyed. Blue applied by immersion over resist (chintz).. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-40.
